image.description: The image  of the avatar. Defaults to empty string.

imgAlt.description: The imgAlt for provide alt in img of the avatar. Defaults to empty string.

initials.description: Initials to be displayed. If not provided, initials will be derived from the name input. Supports on up to two characters.

name.description: The name  of the avatar. Defaults to empty string.

size.description: Size of the avatar. Possible values sm | md | lg | xl. Defaults to empty string.
